means: 未弯曲的，直的，不屈服的
变直( unbend的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: In her dying days the old Queen unbent a little.
sentence.Network_cn: 在临死的那些日子里，年迈的女王态度稍缓和了一些。

sentence.Network_en: At the party even the professors unbent and told jokes.
sentence.Network_cn: 在晚会上,连教授们也变得轻松随和,讲些笑话.

sentence.Network_en: Trees with straight unbent trunks make the best lumber.
sentence.Network_cn: 树干笔直的树木是最好的木材材料.

entry.def: If someone unbends, their attitude becomes less strict than it was.

example.ex: In her dying days the old Queen unbent a little.
example.tran: 在临死的那些日子里，年迈的女王态度稍缓和了一些。

sentences.sentence: "trees with straight unbent trunks make the best lumber"
"behind him sat old man Arthur; he was straight with something angry in his attitude"

auth_sentence.content: Dr Mitchell was beginning to expand. With Alvina he quite unbent.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dr Mitchell was beginning to expand. With Alvina he quite unbent.
